foreignData.name: Hochstapler-Mech
foreignData.text:
Du kannst den Hochstapler-Mech als Kopie einer Kreatur, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, ins Spiel kommen lassen, außer dass er ein Fahrzeug-Artefakt mit Bemannen 3 ist und alle anderen Kartentypen verliert.
Bemannen 3

foreignData.name: Mecha imposteur
foreignData.text:
Vous pouvez faire que le Mecha imposteur arrive sur le champ de bataille comme une copie d'une créature qu'un adversaire contrôle, excepté que c'est un artefact Véhicule avec pilotage 3 et qu'il perd tous ses autres types de carte.
Pilotage 3

foreignData.name: 模倣メカ
foreignData.text:
あなたは模倣メカを、搭乗３を持つ機体・アーティファクトであり、他のすべてのカード・タイプを失うことを除き、対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体のコピーとして戦場に出してもよい。
搭乗３
foreignData.type: アーティファクト — 機体

foreignData.name: 代形机体
foreignData.text:
你可以使代形机体当成任一由对手操控之生物的复制品来进入战场，但它是具搭载3异能的载具神器，且失去所有其他牌张类别。
搭载3

name: Imposter Mech
originalText:
You may have Imposter Mech enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature an opponent controls, except it's a Vehicle artifact with crew 3 and it loses all other card types.
Crew 3

rulings.text: Imposter Mech does not copy any subtypes related to a card type that it lost. For example, if Imposter Mech enters the battlefield as a copy of a 1/1 Human Soldier token, it is neither a Human nor a Soldier. It won't gain those subtypes if it is later crewed.

If Imposter Mech enters the battlefield as a copy of a creature that was also a planeswalker, it loses both the planeswalker and creature card types. Its controller may activate any loyalty abilities it now has as normal, but it notably cannot be attacked and it does not lose loyalty counters when it is dealt damage.

text:
You may have Imposter Mech enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature an opponent controls, except it's a Vehicle artifact with crew 3 and it loses all other card types.
Crew 3
